Constructor Detail

ATMImplementation

public ATMImplementation()
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                         java.net.MalformedURLException,
                         java.rmi.NotBoundException
Default no-arg constructor. Looks up the remote Bank and remove Security authority from the rmiregistry, initializes an empty list of ATMListeners, and initializes the cash available to $500.
